name: yellowtoy
description: 《yellowtoy》 is a relaxed, casual, action, horizontal version of the game, the game is mainly through the collection of "Spar", using the collected spar to create new props, players can use these props to pass through the levels! And by killing the monster, you can upgrade the character level and reach the corresponding level to get new production ability. The number of spar determines whether you can successfully make these items!
